backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining surgery case management system with types (Species, Sex, Task, SurgeryCase), CRUD operations for cases and user profiles, OpenAI configuration, dashboard queries, and role-based access control using MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two features: restoring complete project state from Version 67 and removing post-Version 67 AuthProvider/authentication context changes, both with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend TypeScript/React files covering App.tsx, hooks, auth components, case management views, forms, validation, search, CSV import/export, and checklist functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes defining colors for background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, borders, and sidebar components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with PWA meta tags, favicon links, manifest reference, Apple touch icon configuration, and script tag loading main.tsx.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining SurgiPaw app metadata, standalone display mode, theme colors, and icon references for 192x192 and 512x512 sizes.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy for static assets, precaching app shell on install, cleaning old caches on activate, and skipping caching for Internet Identity and API calls.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component with Internet Identity authentication, view routing (dashboard/cases/settings), profile setup modal, admin-only settings access, case navigation, and forced light theme enforcement.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Lo: Login/logout button component using Internet Identity with query cache clearing on logout, error handling for duplicate authentication, and primary/outline button styling.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Pr: Modal dialog that prompts new users to enter their name on first login, using a form with validation and mutation hook to save the profile.
frontend/src/features/cases/checklist.ts: Defines checklist items (discharge notes, labs, imaging, etc.) with their field mappings, default selections, and utility functions for calculating task completion and styling.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/C: Displays a surgery case card with editable notes, task checklist management, delete confirmation dialog, and progress tracking with color-coded task badges.
Dialog for creating or editing surgery cases with fields for patient info, arrival date, species, breed, and AI-powered structured text parsing to auto-populate form fields.
Main list view component that displays filtered, sorted, and searchable surgery cases with controls for species/task filtering, CSV import/export, and case highlighting/scrolling.
Search input component with clear button for filtering cases by any field.
Dropdown select control for sorting cases by various criteria using predefined sort options.
Popover filter with checkboxes for filtering cases by species, persisting selections to session storage.
A popover filter component that allows users to filter cases by task types and completion status, persisting selections to session storage.
A checklist component that displays task items with checkboxes, supporting both creation mode (selecting tasks) and completion mode (marking tasks complete), with color-coded borders.
A panel component providing CSV export and import functionality for surgery cases, with progress tracking, error handling, and support for creating or updating cases.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/D: A date input component with calendar picker that auto-formats MM/DD/YYYY input, validates dates, and auto-advances to the next field on completion.
Core CSV import/export logic that converts surgery cases to/from CSV format, parsing fields with validation and matching existing cases by medical record number.
frontend/src/features/cases/csv/caseCsvS: Defines the CSV schema with 17 columns for surgery case import/export, including headers, validation constants, and documentation for date/boolean/enum formats.
frontend/src/features/cases/filtering.ts: Provides filtering functions for surgery cases by species, task types, and completion status. Filters cases based on selected species, incomplete tasks, or whether all tasks are completed.
frontend/src/features/cases/parsing/pars: Preprocesses raw OCR text by normalizing whitespace, correcting common character recognition errors (O/0, I/1/l confusion), and removing artifacts. Used as fallback for cleaning semi-structured AI responses.
Parses structured text in label:value format to extract case information fields (MRN, pet name, dates, species, etc.). Serves as fallback for AI responses and supports Quick Fill feature.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/generate: Generates a PDF report of surgery cases with remaining tasks using browser's native print functionality via a hidden iframe. Creates landscape-oriented HTML table with case details and styling.
Generates and downloads a CSV report of surgery cases including all fields and remaining tasks. Handles CSV field escaping and creates timestamped filename.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/pdfForma: Provides formatting utilities for PDF display: converts Time (bigint nanoseconds) to MM/DD/YYYY strings, formats Species and Sex enums to readable text, and handles text truncation and task list formatting.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/reportFo: Provides formatting utilities for CSV reports: converts Time to MM/DD/YYYY strings and formats Species and Sex enums to readable text for CSV export.
frontend/src/features/cases/search.ts: Implements case-insensitive search across surgery case fields (MRN, names, species, breed, complaint, notes) and remaining checklist tasks. Returns filtered cases matching the query.
frontend/src/features/cases/services/aiI: Empty file, likely placeholder for AI image analysis service functionality.
frontend/src/features/cases/sorting.ts: Provides sorting functionality for surgery cases by arrival date (newest/oldest) or open task count (most/fewest). Defines sort options and implements comparison logic.
frontend/src/features/cases/types.ts: Defines TypeScript types and constants for case forms: Species and Sex option arrays, and CaseFormData interface with all case fields including dates, patient info, and medical details.
frontend/src/features/cases/validation.t: Provides validation and parsing functions for case form fields including medical record number, pet name, owner name, breed, species, sex, dates, and booleans with extensive logging and normalization logic.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/componen: Main dashboard component that displays a filterable, searchable list of surgery cases with task status indicators, species badges, and navigation to individual cases; includes PDF generation and sorting capabilities.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/utils/op: Utility functions to extract open tasks from individual cases and calculate total open task counts across all cases using checklist item logic.
frontend/src/features/settings/component: Settings page component for configuring OpenAI API key with validation status display, secure input field with show/hide toggle, and save functionality using React Query mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, handles actor creation with admin token initialization, and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Simple React hook that debounces a changing value with configurable delay (default 500ms) using setTimeout cleanup pattern.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and authentication status with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for CRUD operations on surgery cases, user profiles, and OpenAI configuration, including fetching all cases, creating/updating/deleting cases, and managing task updates with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a light blue color scheme for the application, including specific colors for patient names, species fields, presenting complaints, and notes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function that combines clsx and tailwind-merge to merge CSS class names intelligently.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, InternetIdentityProvider context, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/types/jspdf-autotable.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for jspdf-autotable library types.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for jspdf library types.
frontend/src/types/tesseract.d.ts: TypeScript type definitions for Tesseract.js OCR library, including worker interfaces, recognition options, and result structures with text, confidence, and bounding box data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters and session storage, supporting both regular query strings and hash-based routing with persistence across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color tokens using OKLCH color space, border radius variables, Inter font family, and plugins for animations and typography.
project_state.json: Project metadata file indicating this is SurgiPaw, an authentication app at version 9 with features to restore project state from version 67 and remove post-v67 AuthProvider changes.
